fullplot: Eighteen-year-old Mathieu is vacationing at the beach with his family when he meets local teen Cèdric. After an extremely erotic kiss, the boys begin a passionate romance, complete with skinny-dipping at night, nude dancing on the beach and intense lovemaking in the dunes. Yet as Mathieu grapples with his sexuality and copes with his sick mother, absent father and annoying kid sister his bond with Cèdric grows stronger until it bursts.
plot: Mathieu, 18, spends the summer at his mother's summer house, in Brittany. On the beach, he meets Cèdric, a boy his age. A love-story begins between the two boys.
title: Come Undone
